overview: Brian Issleb is a designer, developer, and businessman. His expert high-level design and heads-down code skills have landed him consulting and contracting opportunities for many Fortune 500 companies. At Clarity Consulting, he helped architect systems for companies including Microsoft, Volkswagen, Dell and Mayer Brown. At Barrington Interactive, he built a flexible publishing platform that continues to support more than 20 television stations and numerous company projects. He received his B.S. in Management Information System from the University of Illinois (Champaign-Urbana), where he also performed graduate work in information science. He is married and brings his own chair to coding parties.
